name: PHULWARI

address: SHRI NIWAS PURI, NEAR SANATAN DHARAM RADHA KRISHAN MANDIR

briefDescription: Phulwari Focus on  aims and Objects  and look forward to fulfill the following objects individually , jointly or in a team.i.	To provide sound education to the children and women of all communities irrespective of their  religions, cast  general and to prepare them to become mature and responsible citizens of the country. ii.	Maintaining  Open House, vocational courses  with an object  of spreading the message of  value of education to poor children and women in slumsiii.	Phulwari promote literacy, cultural and other social activities ,financial support to girl child,condenses courses for women,  Awareness Programs, Adult Education Classes,   award prizes, in recognition of excellence in academic performance.
